title: # 349 - Sean Patton & ME
description:
Today I sit down in the mancave with Sean Patton. We talk about diseases, where we think comedy is going, racist art, SJWs, and much more!

Check out Seans brand new podcast "Five Words" wherever you get your podcasts.

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. Get the complete hair kit for just $5 when you go to www.forhims.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Ring. Make your neighborhood safer with the neighbors app by Ring. Download for free today at www.ring.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Fiverr. Get 10% off your first order by going to www.fiverr.com and use the code "Bertcast"

This episode is also brought to you by Harry’s. Get a trial set with everything you need for quality shaving and grooming products at www.harrys.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Earnest. Apply today and receive a $100 cash bonus when you get a private student loan at www.earnest.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Clutter. Get $50 off your first month of on demand storage at www.clutter.com/bertcast

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on pre sale now! Use the promo code “Shots” to get tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
